scripts.check: npm run-script --silent check:commit && npm run-script --silent check:package-json-sort && npm run-script --silent check:lint && npm run-script --silent check:config && npm run-script --silent check:typescript && npm run-script --silent check:test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run-script --silent check:commit && npm run-script --silent check:config && npm run-script --silent transform:clear && npm run-script --silent transform:package-json-sort && npm run-script --silent transform:lint && npm run-script --silent transform:typescript && npm run-script --silent check:test
scripts.transform: npm run-script --silent transform:package-json-sort && npm run-script --silent transform:lint && npm run-script --silent transform:typescript
scripts.watch: tmux new-session "npm run-script --silent watch:lint" \; \split-window -h "npm run-script --silent watch:test" \; \split-window -v "npm run-script --silent watch:typescript" \; \select-pane -t 0 \; \split-window -v "npm run-script --silent watch:config" \; set status off
